word_mean: 粘着的，粘连的，有粘性的
胶粘剂：使毗邻表面紧密粘连的物质

sentence.Network_en: Glue the mirror in with a strong adhesive.
sentence.Network_cn: 用强力胶将镜子固定到位。

sentence.Network_en: Use vinyl seam adhesive where vinyls overlap.
sentence.Network_cn: 塑料布相叠处用塑料封口胶粘起来。

sentence.Network_en: You'll need a strong adhesive to mend that chair.
sentence.Network_cn: 你需要一种粘性很强的东西来修理那把椅子.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent. (in the sense 'tending to adhere or cling to'): from French adhésif -ive, from the verb adhérer, from Latin adhaerere 'stick to' (see adhere)

entry.def: An adhesive is a substance such as glue, which is used to make things stick firmly together.

example.ex: Glue the mirror in with a strong adhesive.
example.tran: 用强力胶将镜子固定到位。

entry.tran: 黏合的；黏着的；有附着力的
entry.def: An adhesive substance is able to stick firmly to something else.

means.word_mean: 1. a substance that unites or bonds surfaces together

auth_sentence.content: Stick, peel and re-stick a piece of existing adhesive tape several times and it quickly loses its clingy properties.
auth_sentence.res_content: Stick, peel and re-stick a piece of existing adhesive tape several times and it quickly loses its clingy properties.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Stick, peel and re-stick a piece of existing adhesive tape several times and it quickly loses its clingy properties.

auth_sentence.content: There is no "visco-elastic" adhesive to dry out, so it stays attached for longer and leaves no residue.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is no "visco-elastic" adhesive to dry out, so it stays attached for longer and leaves no residue.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is no "visco-elastic" adhesive to dry out, so it stays attached for longer and leaves no residue.

auth_sentence.content: Surgical tape is available from the pharmacist and works in the same way but is a little less adhesive.
auth_sentence.res_content: Surgical tape is available from the pharmacist and works in the same way but is a little less adhesive.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Surgical tape is available from the pharmacist and works in the same way but is a little less adhesive.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 粘性物质[如粘胶],带粘性的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad增加+hes粘附+ive……的→adj.&n.粘性物质[如粘胶],带粘性的
ad增加+hes粘附+ion表名词→n.支持,粘着
hesitate[v.犹豫,踌躇;含糊,支吾]+ion表名词→n.犹豫, 踌躇
hes粘附+itate→粘粘糊糊→犹豫不决

sentences.en: Use a good waterproof adhesive in addition to the screws.
sentences.cn: 除了螺钉外, 还要用优质防水黏合剂。

sentences.en: You'll need a strong adhesive to mend that chair.
sentences.cn: 你需要一种粘性很强的东西来修理那把椅子。

sentences.en: Would you give me an adhesive stamp?
sentences.cn: 请给我一枚带胶邮票好吗?

jushi.chinese: 请给我一枚带胶邮票好吗?

jushi.english: We remain adhesive to the cause.
